exec: pm.test("indicator_baseline_iso_date are in solr format, and empty values are 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z", function () {

body.raw:
<iati-activities version="2.03">
    <iati-activity >
        <iati-identifier>ACT-1</iati-identifier>
        <result type="1">
      <title>
        <narrative xml:lang="en">3.3. Countries access knowledge resources, capacity building support initiatives, and cross-country learning related to NDC implementation through the Partnership Knowledge Portal, peer to peer exchanges, and outreach materials.</narrative>
      </title>
      <indicator measure="5">
        <title>
          <narrative xml:lang="en">3.3.1.a Knowledge Portal (Toolbox Navigator, Funding initiatives Navigator, Case Study Database) redesigned and launched in 2018</narrative>
        </title>
        <baseline year="2017" iso-date="2020-10-29"/>
        <period>
          <period-start iso-date="2019-01-01"/>
          <period-end iso-date="2020-12-31"/>
          <target value="Yes"/>
          <actual value="Yes">
            <location ref="2020"/>
          </actual>
        </period>
      </indicator>
      <indicator measure="1">
        <title>
          <narrative xml:lang="en">3.3.1.b Number of members refreshing the Knowledge Portal with new knowledge resources/tools annually</narrative>
        </title>
        <baseline year="2017"/>
        <period>
          <period-start iso-date="2019-01-01"/>
          <period-end iso-date="2020-12-31"/>
          <target value="20"/>
          <actual value="36">
            <location ref="2020"/>
          </actual>
        </period>
      </indicator>
      <indicator measure="1">
        <title>
          <narrative xml:lang="en">3.3.1.c Number of unique users accessing the Knowledge Portal</narrative>
        </title>
        <baseline year="2017" iso-date="2019-01-01" value="1000"/>
        <period>
          <period-start iso-date="2019-01-01"/>
          <period-end iso-date="2020-12-31"/>
          <target value="3000"/>
          <actual value="3374">
            <location ref="2020"/>
          </actual>
        </period>
      </indicator>
    </iati-activity>
</iati-activities>

    <iati-activity>
        <iati-identifier>ACT-1</iati-identifier>
        <reporting-org ref="AA-AAA-123456789" type="40" secondary-reporter="0">
            <narrative>Organisation name</narrative>
            <narrative xml:lang="fr">Nom de l'organisme</narrative>
        </reporting-org>
        <transaction ref="1234" humanitarian="1">
            <transaction-type code="1" />
            <transaction-date iso-date="2012-01-01" />
        </transaction>
        <transaction ref="5678">
            <transaction-type code="2" />
            <transaction-date iso-date="2013-01-01" />
        </transaction>
    </iati-activity>
</iati-activities>
